00011111 10001011 00001000 00000000 11010011 00111111 11110010 01110010 00000000 11111111 00000101 00000000 00100001 00001010 00000000 00100001 11101100 01011000 00011110 01011001 01010101 00101101 00101010 10110010 11100000 10000010 10001100 00110101 00000111 11011010 11101110 00101110 00011100 00000111 01111011 11111110 01001100 10010101 11011110 00001101 01110101 11001010 11111001 11000011 00101011 00100110 10111101 11101001 11001000 00110011 01111111 10000110 01110100 01000111 10000110 00100001 10000100 11101110 10011000 00001001 01101100 00111010 00100100 00000000 00000000 00000000

Round and round we go with ones and zeros.  What year is it? Long time since Vegenere was alive.  Maybe we should look at the year through Vegenere's eyes.  Wonder what posture he would have on gun control?
